articles.content: “Experience is not playing more matches, experience is learning from matches you play. If you play 30 matches, but you don’t learn from them, it is playing the same match 30 times. In these experienc… [+1590 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: 'No one has told me any different' - Mourinho expects Spurs' clash with Villa to go ahead - Goal (English)
articles.description: Luka Jovic is close to an end to his horror spell at Real Madrid and will be allowed to depart the club on loan this month and return to former club Eintracht Frankfurt, Goal has learned.
